full_text:
C. Bureau of Prisons' Web Address
The web address is http://www.bop.gov. You can access the Inmate Locator, Bureau Program Statements, and procedures for requesting documents under the Freedom of Information Act.
Page 2 of 22
DOJ-OGR-00023745
